content: fidget leaves earrings by ediblewishez12 on ravelry 3mm hook sport weight yarn 2 jump rings 2 earring hooks needle nose pliers fidget piece make two 1 big leaf chain 6 *slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet and half_double_crochet in next st double_crochet half_double_crochet and single_crochet in next st slip_stitch* repeat from * to * on other side of the chain working over the beginning tail of yarn 2 vine and small leaf chain 8 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet increase slip_stitch 3 vine chain 18 4 second small leaf slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet increase slip_stitch 5 vine and second big leaf chain 8 *slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet and half_double_crochet in next st double_crochet half_double_crochet and single_crochet in next st slip_stitch* adjusting the worked portion of the vine over your hook before repeating from * to * on the other side of the chain see pictures weave in ends open the jump ring and place the earring hook onto it place the middle vine section of the crocheted piece into the jump ring be sure not to catch any fibers on the jump ring or it will not slide unless you want static earrings then go ahead finally close the jump ring tightly so that the yarn won t catch on it while you re fidgeting with it how to adjust your work during step 5
